reviews.review: Very fun game with great technical aspects. I really enjoyed it and it helped my brain with problem solving. Would highly recommend.
Fun puzzle game with your friends or by yourself
i would say its perfect but i have 0 friends.

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado creo que la franquicia realmente explota todo su potencial con esta entrega, su primicia parece ser muy sencilla pero Portal 2 es de esos pocos juegos que puedes seguir explorando y encontrando muchos secretos.
Fun relaxing game to play between your Doom and Fallout sessions

you can create dungeons like in zelda, accept the gameplay is different.
Yes but give me Portal 3 Valve

De los mejores juegos de Valve, es un juego divertido lleno de un humor inedito. Con una jugabilidad innovadora para el 2011.
Cansarse de el es difÃ­cil.
Jugar los mapas de comunidad es una gran experiencia.
Y el modo historia es simplemente arte.
Es un juego increible para el 2011, pudo haber salido este 2020 o 2021 y aun asi seria un juegazo.
Recomendadisimo al 100%

Amazing, Wonderful. 10/10. a classic. a shame I have no friends to play it with but the singleplayer is so much fun and I`m not even done yet. will update maybe if I change my mind. This game has so many fun puzzles and builds upon the world of the first game and I would definitely recommend without a doubt. only issue is the amount of loading screens but they`re quick and personalized. 

great story too, just so much positives.
